scripts.start: concurrently "cd interface && npm start" "cd api && npm start "
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd interface && npm start" "cd api && npm run develop"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd api && npm test" "cd interface && npm test"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd interface && npm install" "cd api && npm install"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd interface && npm run lint" "cd api && npm run lint"
